name: Bonville Lodge Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you for your hospitality and great meals, good company, excellent hosts, we will be passing on the word to our family to come and stay on there way past.
reviews.title: Peaceful and Relaxing

reviews.text: This place is just so peaceful we are totally relaxed. thanks again.
reviews.title: Arrived Late and Made So Welcomed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you for being wonderful, thoughtful hosts. Arrived late to be welcomed with a warm and inviting smile, followed by an amazing well cooked steak (yummy). The gardens are a credit to your dedication and the perfumed smell of the flowers are a delight to the senses. Many thanks for your hospitality.
reviews.title: "Bonville Lodge is a Real Find"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We could not have found a better place to spend our 5th wedding anniversary. The gardens are spectacular and your hospitality and friendliness are outstanding. We enjoyed ourselves immensely and we will be back! Regards "The Bostonians"
reviews.title: "What can we Say"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The welcome and friendship shown to us was amazing, the food was beautiful, the gardens so peaceful. All this plus a "safe spot" for the Harley!!
reviews.title: What a Great Place to Stay

likes.liked: — The persons to person help and courtious manner

reviews.text: Thank you for a Very Lovely Two Nights in your Bed and Breakfast.
reviews.title: What a wonderful Experience

reviews.text: Wonderful gardens and a great place to stay and enjoy my 75th Birthday.
reviews.title: Beautiful Gardens for a Wedding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You will see us again.
reviews.title: Loved this Bed and Breakfast

likes.liked: — Feeling made so welcome from the time we arrived to the time we left.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you so much.
reviews.title: Nobody gets 5 out of 5????

likes.disliked: — There truly was nothing - first time ever.

reviews.text: Thank you for allowing us to use you beautiful garden as the place we chose to have to exchange our vows.
reviews.title: Wonderful Accommodation
Great stay, just too short
reviews.text: Lovely place, family feel, wonderful hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you
reviews.title: Unique - A very special Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Sean
reviews.title: A Brilliant Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having stayed at many B&B's, Homestays, Hotels ~ you name it ~ over much of the world ~ the most suitable, single, descriptive word I can think of for what Ron & Cathy have created here is "Unique" a very special place.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay and Friendly

reviews.text: First and foremost it is a home ~ their home~ shared so willingly and openly with their guests. Ron~ the man of many parts ~ entrepreneur, extraordinaire, Bob the Builder, Adam the gardener and dare I say it Gordon Ramsay (without the *******word) his Thai Chicken on our first evening was just perfect ~ but was slightly surpassed by his really, really great Rack of Lamb on our last night. We ate and relished the lot.
reviews.title: A Gem of a Place

reviews.text: From the moment we arrived to the time we left we did not have to do a thing, just relax and recharge our bones.
reviews.title: Just Beautiful

likes.liked: — Not having to do anything, totally relaxing and peaceful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hospitality from our host where very warm and welcoming.
reviews.title: Wow - this is the wow factor

likes.liked: — Feeling safe and the relaxed atmosphere

reviews.text: The food was delicious and very generous serves. We would recommend any body traveling to Coffs Harbour to stay at Bonville Lodge you will not be disappointed.
reviews.title: We have just been to Paradise

likes.liked: — Felt as if we knew the hosts and were great friends

reviews.text: Visitors from Norway
reviews.title: Return Visit and Just as Nice as the 1st

reviews.text: Service, comfort, hospitality, I can not speak high enough of this wonderful bed and breakfast. Nothing less than perfect. Its like being at home. The most gracious hosts. We stayed here for 3 nights and loved every bit of it. The Accommodation was very cozy, the food was delicious. Would recommend to everybody, will not be disappointed, beats staying in any resort or motel.
reviews.title: Just Perfect, Amazing

likes.liked: — So relaxing felt completely refreashed by the time we had to leave

description: Coffs Harbour Accommodation - Bonville Lodge Luxury Bed and Breakfast offers Studio Apartment or Self Contained Accommodation located Mid North Coast NSW. Accommodation with a resort style setting. Peaceful and Relaxing
